name: NumNum - Math Game for Kids
description:
NumNum - Math Game for Kids
NumNum is a fun and Educational Math Race for kids ages 5 to 10 (but also younger children enjoys playing with the fishes).

⁃ Repetitive basic math learning made fun!
⁃ Practise Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and Division at your own pace.
⁃ Friendly race to motivate learning answers by heart.
⁃ Get awarded with a new playable fish for every won level.
⁃ Get awarded with a Fish Follower for each mastered discipline.
⁃ 31 levels and one Mix All practice level.
⁃ Ad-free and no in-app purchases.


Pastille is a Swedish game studio. We create fun, casual and non-violent games for the whole family and we believe that playing is one of the most important cornerstones in life.

We deeply care about sustainability, ethics, social- and gender equality, human- and animal rights.

NumNum supports the Against Malaria Foundation (AMF). Bed nets are the most effective way to prevent malaria in children, who account for the majority of malaria-related deaths. https://www.againstmalaria.com
